ygData.subject: OK- perhaps a lead on a weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in Rathe Mountains last night hunting and someone who i did not know asked me if I knew anything about the shining star of light quest. I had never heard
ygData.messageBody:
I was in Rathe Mountains last night hunting and someone who i did not know
asked me if I knew anything about the shining star of light quest.

I had never heard of it before, so i continued to ask this person what in
the world they were talking about. He said that is ia a cleric and paladin
only weapon and he said it is obtained through a quest of some sort.

I have no info othewr than this, this person claims he has seen one and only
one of them and that is why he was asking me if i knew the quest( apparently
he wants to get one)

I would like to find out about this, i don't even know if it really exists
and if it does what the stats of this weapon are.

Perhaps we can all keep an ear out about this item. Any info would be
appreciated

Bree Wyndsdale
35th Cleric of Fennin Ro
(hell level)
